title: Looking to make a Serious ranked team !
body:
So i have been looking to make a serious ranked team for quite a while, i know i might not find to many but i really want to make a team and have pratice and improve as a team , please feel free to post some stuff down below and we can have some trails when we get a few wanting to join! 

 Main Role:
Fav Champs:
Why you want to join a team:
Rank:
TS/skype:

replies.body:
Main Role: Support/Jungle/Top
Fav Champs: Blitzcrank, Morgana, Janna, Annie, Warwick, Fiddlesticks, Amumu, Nasus, 
why: because i feel like joining a ranked team and trying new %%%%
Rank: Gold 1 last Season, Silver 2 after placements 
Skype:Batron3000

Main Role: ADC
Fav Champs: Varus, Vayne, Corki, Caitlyn and Lucian
Why you want to join a team: Meet new people and join and team that is serious
Rank: last season S3 this season placed in B5 already working to Silver again
TS/skype: Lukel3131

Main Role: support (plus jg-can play any but those are top two)
Fav CHAMPS: thresh, morg, braum, blitz (for jg: vi, lee will be increasing this pool)
Why you want to join a team: to primarily play one role to increase skill, am over solo q with afks+rage quitters and trolls
Rank: b5 this season, was b2 end of last, i have played against silvers-golds without a problem (as support)
TS/skype: i have skype (will give if im in the team)

Main Role: Mid
Fav Champs: Syndra, Ori, Zed, Ahri and pretty much all mid laners tbh but those are my most fav
Why do you want to join a team: i want to join a team not just to play as a team in ranked 5's but to meets new people and learn the game more together
Rank: Unranked atm (Silver 5 last season)
TS/Skype: i have both so i dont really care which one we use

Main Role: Jungle
Fav Champs: Nidalee, Rek'Sai, Lee Sin, Wukong, Pantheon, J4 and Diana
Why you want to join a team: Meet new people
Rank: Gold 3
TS/skype: Either one but will only give it out if I'm accepted
